title: Episode 30: The Death of JonBenét Ramsey: Part 2
description:
JonBenét Ramsey's brutal murder captivated a nation. At the time, the family hired an army of lawyers and refused to talk to police. Did they have something to hide, someone to protect, or were they simply taking precautions against an overzealous police force bent on framing them? Suspects have cropped up, but DNA evidence, behavioral analysis, and expert testimony all provide conflicting theories. Through all the theories, one goal emerges - justice for an innocent girl slain on Christmas.

itunes:author: Cloud10 and iHeartPodcasts
itunes:subtitle: The Ramsey Family went to bed Christmas night and had no idea what awaited them the morning of December 26, 1996. After 22 years of botched investigations and lawsuits, her family has been left with theories and accusations.
